name: Hotaru Tomoe - Sailor Saturn - Character LORA
description:
Trained to be semi-realistic lora.

Trained on nai with 102 pictures (mostly fanarts)
Best result with weight between : 0.8-1

Prompt activator :
Sailor outfit : sailor saturn, purple sailor collar, sailor collar, sailor senshi uniform
Casual outfit : tomoe hotaru
Tiara prompt : gold tiara on her forehead, tiara
The tiara can be random but it works well when it pops. I tried without the lora and tiara was always on the head and not on the forehead behind the hair.


Polearm prompt : polearm
Don't prompt for polearm except you want ultra-gacha generation because like others weapons SD doesn't understand the concept really well.

Commissioned by Ocelot1300 on fiverr

Reviews are really appreciated, i love to see the community use my work, that's why I share it.
If you like my work, you can tip me here.

Got a specific request ? I'm open for commission on my fiverr gig *! If you provide enough data, OCs are accepted

*Any paid request will not be presented on this page, unless you give me permission to.
